
	

	# Getting Started: Part 2
	
	### Population Set Operations
	

	

	

	

	

	

	

	

	
		 
	
	## Description
	There are many use cases for subsetting a CDM
		population, often by phenotype.

    The SQL in the QueryLibrary makes these set operations
		very simple.
	
	
		 
	## Query
	```sql
	[10 9 9 83 69 76 69 67 84 32 99 111 117 110 116 40 42 41 32 65 83 32 112 101 114 115 111 110 95 99 111 117 110 116 32 70 82 79 77 32 112 101 114 115 111 110 10 10 9 9 45 45 32 73 78 78 69 82 32 74 79 	## Common Table Expression (CTE)
	```
	
	
	- [female](./female.md) 
	
	
	
	
		
	
	## CTE Exclusion
	
	
	- [uninsured](./insured.md)
